articles.title: Fans Loud And Loyal In Seattle Despite The Torrent Being Shut Out 3-0
articles.description: The Seattle Torrent had the on-ice portion of their historic and record setting home opener spoiled by the Minnesota Frost, who shut out the Torrent at Climate Pledge Arena.
